spell.name: Construct Savant
entries: You begin to craft an item as if using the crafting activity, but with the empowering effects of your dragonmark guiding you, your efficiency is increased exponentially.
When you perform the Crafting activity for a non-consumable item with more than 1 day of work remaining, you can cast Construct Savant as part of the activity and immediately make a crafting check.

entries.Critical Success: You finish crafting the item, paying the market cost.
entries.Success: You complete your work for the day and continue it tomorrow.

dragonmark.siberys: On a Critical Success, you only pay the material cost.
